Package org.dellroad.jibxbindings.pidf.lo.gml Description

JiBX bindings for the Presence Information Data Format - Location Object (PIDF-LO) GML.

This package includes several abstract JiBX mapping definitions for GML XML structures. This package models the subset of GML that is used for PIDF-LO described by RFC 5491.

See Also:
RFC 5491, GML PIDF-LO Geometry Shape Application Schema for use in the IETF, JiBX Bindings
